Ok, so I was seeing images of Kerbin from my space station in a cupola and tried clicking in a object which was probably debris, it was pretty close to the center in the glass pane.

Two clicks target objects, I clicked and it zoomed in, I DIDN'T use scroll.

Check these pictures to see how it is like.

Before (the clicking area was slightly below the "No Target")

After Clicking

Also, if you click twice in nearly the same spot while it is zoomed in it goes back to normal.

The zoom level is relative to the level of zoom before you click to zoom. ("zoom" is getting kinda repetitive here...)

It is not my mouse, because clicking twice anywhere else and out of cockpit view doesn't zooms it in.

Question is: Did you knew clicking twice in cockpit view zooms in, in a "toggle" setting?

Edited June 15, 2013 by cesarcurado
I believe it's just windows, could be wrong. Double clicking any window in IVA gives you an out the window view
When you double click a window you will focus on it.
